get.summary: Get analytics report for delivered shipments on time.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the rate by which shipments are successfully delivered on time on intervals.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval by which to arrange the dataset.

parameters.name: filter[date_from]
parameters.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at >= this date will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[date_to]
parameters.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at <= this date will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[shop]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of shop ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[organization]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of organization ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[carrier]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of carrier ids to filter by.

200.description: Retrieved the analytics data in timeseries.
